original_text: The Lord will bless you with lots of food to store. He will bless all the work that you do. He will bless you very much in the land that he is giving to you.
korean_text: 여호와께서 명령하사 네 창고와 네 손으로 하는 모든 일에 복을 내리시고 네 하나님 여호와께서 네게 주시는 땅에서 네게 복을 주실 것이며

sentences.original_text: with lots of food to store
He will bless all the work
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 모든 일을 복 주실 것이다

sentences.original_text: He will bless you very much
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 너를 매우 많이 복 주실 것이다

sentences.original_text: that he is giving to you
